TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it's a oneway only time machine.

I wish for a cake.

Granted. It is a lie.

I wish that people would grant wishes without trying to find loopholes.

granted, instead they try to kill each other

i wish i had an AV-8

granted.... however the earth falls apart on the moment you touch it!

i wish for a high end computer.

granted, but it is destroyed in shipping

I want a speedboat

Granted, but it's made of solid gold.

I want a single molecule of H2O.

granted, However you lose it

I want more solid fuel boosters
Granted. But the SRBs were so solid they held your rocket down. I wish for a...

Granted. "a..." is all you can say for the rest of your life.

I wish for a car that uses water as its fuel.

granted, its so inneficient that it used all the water on the earth

good luck surviving

i wish a kerbal lander landed in front of my house

Granted, Jeb landed it. Your house was promptly turned into a booster, with you as Solid Fuel.

I wish.

Granted. It doesn't come true.

I wish that this wish would be granted in the spirit that it was wished for.

ERROR: VARIBLE WISH EMPTY. STRING "this wish" NOT A WISH. NO SPECIFIED WISH, UNGRANTABLE.

I wish for a cookie.

Granted. Here's your flash drive with browser cookies on it.

I wish N&W 1218 was still operational today.

Granted, but the rail ends abruptly at your house. No one notices until it's too late.

I wish that wishing on eyelashes worked.

Granted, those wishes were condemning Earth to Death By Kerbals.

I wish for an incorruptible wish.

granted. You didn't specify what exactly you wanted.... soooooooooooooooooo....

anyways,

I wish for what everyone else wants.

Granted, but you don't get it.

I wish for a pet dog.

granted, hes dead

i wish there was a planet that each 4 years got less than 1.000.000km away from earth

Granted but it's the size of a asteroid

I wish for an flash drive that has a password reset on it

Granted, but it can only reset using another unknown password.

I wish more money went to space programs.

Granted. It goes to the north Korean space agency and they land on the sun.

I wish to grow potatoes

granted, they are mutant potatoes and will dominate the world

i wish kerbals were smarter

Granted. KSP is not nearly as fun now that everything works exactly as planned.

I wish that I could draw better.

Granted, but you draw your old self drawing what you want to draw every time.

I wish I could be more active on the forums ;~;
